abstract_summ: The number of confirmed cases of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in Japan has been increasing day by day and has had a serious impact on the society especially after the declaration of the state of emergency on April 7, 2020 . This study analyzes the real time data from March 1 to April 22, 2020 by adopting a sophisticated statistical modeling tool . The model estimation and forecasting are conducted using the Bayesian methodology .
